jquery.description: A jQuery method added to `jQuery.fn`. It can be used on DOM nodes to create a Filterizr instance. It returns the jQuery object to facilitate method-chaining. If you already have created a Filterizr instance (e.g. `const fltr = $('.container').filterizr({});`), you can use the `.filterizr` method on your instance to access all of Filterizr's public API. For example to filter the grid you can do `fltr.filterizr('filter', targetCategory)`, passing in method name and arguments.

args.name: options
args.description: Filterizr options object, see documentation on "options".
